backend/main.mo: Minimal actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing added frontend env configuration files for draft and live builds.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files related to Solitaire game logic, UI, hooks, and styling.
frontend/.env.draft: Draft environment settings enabling draft mode, disabling advanced shading, and using img card rendering.
frontend/.env.live.example: Example production environment settings enabling live mode, full visual effects, and DOM-based card rendering.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and theming variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount element and default noindex robots policy.
frontend/README-publishing.md: Documentation explaining maintenance, draft, and live publishing states and how to configure them.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App component selecting maintenance, draft, or live mode UI and applying robots policy.
frontend/src/components/DraftIndicator.t: Displays a small fixed-position badge when the app is in draft mode.
Centered maintenance screen with icon and status messaging.
frontend/src/config/cardRenderMode.ts: Reads card rendering mode from env and exports flags for DOM, background-image, or img rendering.
frontend/src/config/publishing.ts: Determines publishing state from environment variables with legacy compatibility handling.
frontend/src/config/visualEffects.ts: Reads env flag controlling whether advanced shading effects are disabled.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/componen: Generates SVG-based image and CSS background sources for card faces and backs based on card properties.
Card rendering component supporting DOM, background-image, and img modes with selection and drag behavior.
Renders buttons for new game, undo, hint, scores, and preferences with handlers and undo disabling.
Displays move count or a disabled message depending on tracking state.
Dialog allowing users to toggle timer, move tracking, and ask-again preferences, resetting values when opened.
Shows the formatted game timer or a disabled message based on settings.
Dialog for selecting timer and move-tracking preferences before starting a new game, resetting to defaults when opened.
Displays waste, foundation, or tableau piles with drag-and-drop support and card interaction behaviors.
Leaderboard dialog showing best times and fewest moves with scrollable lists and formatting.
Win screen dialog showing current results and top scores with timing and move-tracking support.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/hooks/us: React hook providing a start/stop game timer with formatted time output and reset on game change.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/preferen: Loads and saves user preferences for timer, move tracking, and prompts using localStorage.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/results/: Manages persisted playthrough results with add, sort, and time-format utilities using localStorage.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Handles drag-and-drop payload encoding, decoding, and conversion to card selection objects.
Computes the next valid hint by scanning move priorities across waste, tableau, and foundations.
Implements snapshot-based history for undo support, storing past states and move counts.
Contains core Solitaire logic including deck creation, shuffling, dealing, movement rules, and stock drawing.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/Solitair: Main Solitaire page managing game state, dialogs, timers, preferences, and win-result recording.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Defines core Solitaire types, constants, and helpers for suits, ranks, cards, and selections.
Checks win condition by verifying all foundation piles are complete.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/useSolit: Reducer-driven state manager for Solitaire gameplay, including moves, hints, history, and UI selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the Solitaire game.
frontend/src/hooks/useRobotsPolicy.ts: Sets or updates the robots meta tag based on publishing state to control search engine indexing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and defensive CSS for card rendering artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for className merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, tokens, plugins, component styling, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Describes project state, pending live-publishing features, and environment requirements for switching from draft to live mode.
